author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

These caused rootcling to hang in CPP23 build (where CUDA was disabled). At this point (of CUDA-to-Alpaka migration) the dictionaries are not needed anymore.

The dictionaries of `CUDADataFormats/Common` is still kept because of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49656#issuecomment-3670892806.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49653
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1726

#### PR validation:

None
title: Remove most dictionaries of CUDADataFormats
